name: GeoHell
description:
GeoHell is a bullet hell ikaruga-like game in which you have to avoid the opposite color to survive.

In this game, you have to touch the screen in order to move the ship. If you tap the screen, you change the color of the ship. If the color of the ship matches the object you are touching, you are alive. If the color doesn't match, you die.

Used free assets with non commercial use.

Developed with Unity 2018.4.
